message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today at a price of $20,000. I think it's a great deal for something of this quality and I believe you'll find it very valuable.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is too low for me. This product is worth significantly more. How about we meet in the middle at $18,000?

Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to go beyond $12,000 for this product. I hope we can find a solution that respects both our needs.
